name: Snipe Shot
description: You snipe your foe with a high-velocity stream of water. Make a ranged attack, doing 2d6 + MOVE water damage on hit. If the attack was made with advantage, double the damage dice.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
